duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain machinery, ensure production standards are met, finalize products, and prepare them for shipping.
Load and unload items from machines and dollies.
Ensure safety measures are followed at every step of the production process.
Pull damaged or faulty items from the production line.
Record data at each step of the production cycle.
Clean and maintain tools and equipment at the end of each shift.
Check finished products for problems or faults and isolate damaged or inconsistent items immediately.
Label finished items and ensure proper packaging.
Advocate safety practices to the rest of the production staff.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred.
Minimum of 1 year of experience working in a warehouse environment.
